Dear Blokes,

I once had a small tanto (a kaiken??) with a crudish dragon horimono that had a koshirae of wood strips (bamboo?) that was held together with strips of cherry tree bark.  Or so I was told by a friend of the time.  Ron, do you have a picture of an actual tsuka, or is your query "just wondering"??

Regards,

Barry Thomas.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Ron Hartmann 
  To: TOKEN ; nihontostudy ; nihonto@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, July 20, 2006 3:57 AM
  Subject: Tsuka wrapped in cane


  Sure is quiet these days! Curious if anyone can point me to a book illustration showing a tsuka (primarily, a tanto tsuka) that utilized cane or rattan for a wrapping other than silk or baleen. Suggestions???

  Ron
  STL
